Your privacy and data protection are our top priorities

üìã Overview

BMW Concierge is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our service.

Last Updated: August 09, 2025

üîç Information We Collect

Authentication Information

When you log in with GitHub, we collect:

  • Your GitHub username and display name
  • Your public email address (if available)
  • Your GitHub profile picture
  • Basic public profile information

Usage Information

We may collect information about how you use BMW Concierge:

  • Pages visited and features used
  • Time spent on the application
  • Browser type and device information
  • IP address and general location (country/region)

Local Storage

We store authentication tokens locally in your browser to maintain your session:

  • OAuth access tokens (stored locally, not on our servers)
  • User preferences and settings
  • Session state information

üîß How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • Authentication: Verify your identity and maintain secure access
  • Personalization: Customize your BMW Concierge experience
  • Security: Protect against unauthorized access and fraud
  • Improvement: Analyze usage patterns to improve our service
  • Communication: Send important updates about the service (if you opt-in)

üîê Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

  • Encryption: All data transmission uses HTTPS/TLS encryption
  • OAuth 2.0: Secure authentication protocol with GitHub
  • Local Storage: Sensitive data is stored locally, not on our servers
  • No Password Storage: We never store your GitHub password
  • Open Source: Our code is publicly auditable on GitHub
üîí Zero-Trust Architecture: BMW Concierge is designed with privacy by design principles. We minimize data collection and maximize user control over their information.

ü§ù Data Sharing

We respect your privacy and have strict policies regarding data sharing:

üö´ We DO NOT:
  • Sell your personal information to third parties
  • Share your data with advertisers
  • Use your information for marketing purposes
  • Store your data on external servers unnecessarily
‚úÖ We MAY share data only when:
  • Required by law or legal process
  • Necessary to protect our users' safety
  • You explicitly consent to the sharing
  • For technical service provision (GitHub OAuth)

üéõÔ∏è Your Rights and Choices

You have full control over your data and privacy:

Access and Control

  • View Data: Access all information we have about you
  • Update Information: Modify your profile information anytime
  • Delete Account: Remove your account and associated data
  • Revoke Access: Disconnect BMW Concierge from your GitHub account

GitHub OAuth Control

You can manage BMW Concierge's access to your GitHub account:

  • Visit GitHub Settings ‚Üí Applications
  • Find "BMW Concierge" in your authorized OAuth apps
  • Click "Revoke" to immediately disconnect access

Local Data Control

This will clear all locally stored authentication tokens and preferences.

üç™ Cookies and Tracking

BMW Concierge uses minimal tracking technologies:

  • Essential Cookies: Required for authentication and core functionality
  • Local Storage: Stores your preferences and session information
  • No Third-Party Tracking: We don't use analytics or advertising cookies
  • No Cross-Site Tracking: Your activity is not tracked across other websites

üë∂ Children's Privacy

BMW Concierge is not intended for use by children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

üåç International Users

BMW Concierge is hosted on GitHub Pages and may be accessed from anywhere in the world. By using our service, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States and other countries where GitHub operates.

GDPR Compliance: If you're in the European Union, you have additional rights under GDPR, including the right to data portability, rectification, and erasure.

üìù Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by:

  • Updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy
  • Posting a notice on our GitHub repository
  • Displaying a notification in the application (for significant changes)
